chunk:
Thebalm Anne T. Dotes Tinted Moisturizer, #14

Brand: theBalm

Category: Moisturizer

Ingredients: ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, GLYCERIN, COCONUT ALKANES, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE, SORBITAN SESQUIOLEATE, SILICA, GLUCONOLACTONE, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) BRAN EXTRACT, CETEARETH-20, ASTROCARYUM MUR

-20, ASTROCARYUM MURUMURU SEED BUTTER, SODIUM BENZOATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, LINUM USITATISSIMUM (LINSEED) SEED OIL, GOSSYPIUM HERBACEUM (COTTON) SEED OIL, ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL, BIDENS PILOSA EXTRACT, HYDROXYETHYLCELLULOSE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, SODIUM BICARBONATE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) EXTRACT, SODIUM HYDROXIDE

CT, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, TOCOPHEROL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT. MAY CONTAIN [+/-] TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499)]

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
